color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">You are generating a single restaurant review sentence.</font></span></div><div style=""><span style="background-color: transparent;"><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-size: 11px; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">The sentence must mention the given aspect and reflect the given sentiment.&nbsp;</font></span></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Use natural human-like language, realistic and rich vocabulary.</span></font></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Output: one sentence of maximum 20 words. Stop after generating 1 sentence.&nbsp;</span></font></div><div style=""><br></div><div style=""><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Aspect: meat</span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Sentiment: positive</span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Output:</span></font></div></div><div style=""><br></div><div><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 11px;" face="Courier New">The meat was cooked perfectly, and the flavors were&nbsp;</font><span style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 11px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; background-color: transparent;">spot-on.</span></div><div><div><br></div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;shadow=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="105.99841236496607" width="420" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 97px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 19px;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

span.font: You are generating a single restaurant review sentence.

font.span: Use natural human-like language, realistic and rich vocabulary.
